item.description:
MINDBENDING MUNCHIES
(A family friendly vegan night out…)
Friday, November 2, 2012
7:00 pm


V.F.W. HALL
176 Washington St. Warwick, RI 02888


TICKETS ARE NOW ON SALE AT...
http://like-no-udder.com


Join us for an evening of vegan company, treats & seasonal beverages along with humorous & mesmerizing entertainment! After a chance to mingle with like minded friends, you will enjoy freshly baked vegan sweets, our famous chai & hot apple cider. Our night will be capped off by having your mind entertained, bent and blown by local author, mentalist and mindbender RORY RAVEN. There will be more time to socialize after the show.
All for only $12.50 p.p.
Reduced price if you reserve a table of 10 – details will be posted on the web.
All prices rise to $15.00 p.p. on October 9th.
You would spend way more for a night out at the movies!
Responding on this event page is cool, however...
Space is limited - tickets must be pre-purchased.
No tickets will be available at the door.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Mind Bending Munchies
